entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Drizzle or flurries changing to flurries this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Showers beginning before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
